title: Playful Doodle
description: Un style d'illustration fantaisiste dessiné à la main qui imite les croquis au marqueur noir sur du papier chaud avec une palette de couleurs limitée et vibrante. Il présente des contours audacieux, une coloration plate et est entouré d'éléments décoratifs énergiques comme des gribouillis, des formes géométriques et des symboles représentant les idées et la créativité.
prompt: A charming, high-energy hand-drawn illustration style depicting {{subject}}. The artistic technique mimics bold black marker ink on warm, textured cream paper or sketchbook surface. The line work is fluid, organic, and varies in thickness, defining the forms with a cartoon-like simplicity and confident strokes. The color palette is strictly limited to stark black outlines, white negative space, and flat fills of {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}} to create visual pop without gradients or realistic shading. The composition is densely packed with 'brainstorming' artifacts surrounding the subject: floating speech bubbles, jagged excitement lines, handwritten interjections, squiggles, dots, and bold geometric shapes featuring high-contrast black and white stripes. Stylized botanical elements like simple oversized flowers and broad leaves frame the scene to add organic balance to the geometry. The lighting is completely flat, relying on line weight and color contrast rather than shadows to define depth. The overall aesthetic is fun, educational, spontaneous, and graphic, reminiscent of modern corporate editorial illustrations or creative journaling. Reinforcement tags: 2D, vector art style, clean lines, doodle art, flat design, high contrast, beige background, ink outlines, marker texture, playful, minimal shading, Behance style, editorial illustration, crisp, 8k resolution.
background_prompt: A creative pattern of hand-drawn doodles on a warm cream paper texture. The background features scattered black ink elements including squiggly lines, floating exclamation marks, dots, and speech bubbles. Interspersed are geometric shapes filled with bold black and white diagonal stripes and stylized botanical leaves colored in flat {{primary_color}} and {{accent_color}}. The center of the frame remains relatively open to accommodate a foreground element, while the edges are busy with energetic sketching artifacts and abstract decorations.
description_en: A whimsical, hand-drawn illustration style that mimics black marker sketches on warm paper with a limited, vibrant color palette. It features bold outlines, flat coloring, and is surrounded by energetic decorative elements like squiggles, geometric shapes, and symbols representing ideas and creativity.

prompt_removebg: A trendy, high-quality flat vector illustration of {{subject}} executed in a playful, hand-drawn doodle aesthetic. The artwork features thick, confident black monoline contours that define the shapes clearly, resembling a high-quality digital marker sketch. The rendering is strictly 2D with no gradients or realistic shading, relying entirely on high-contrast flat color fills. The {{subject}} is integrated into a dynamic composition surrounded by a chaotic yet pleasing arrangement of creative symbols: abstract floral motifs, geometric shapes with bold black-and-white diagonal stripes, floating speech bubbles, energetic motion lines, dots, and scattered handwritten typography fragments. Use {{primary_color}} as the main fill color for key elements to draw attention, balanced with {{accent_color}} for subtle highlights and details. The entire composition is set against a flat, untextured {{background_color}} background to ensure clean separation and high contrast with the bold black linework. The style draws inspiration from modern corporate Memphis art mixed with sketchbook marginalia, creating a friendly, brainstorming atmosphere.
